title: Web Applications
description: Full-stack web applications built with modern technologies

projects.title: Music Player App
projects.description: Developed a dynamic music player interface inspired by Spotify, with core functionalities including play, pause, and track browsing.

projects.title: Virtual Drum Kit
projects.description: Built a responsive virtual drum kit application that allows users to play sounds by clicking or pressing keyboard keys. Mapped keyboard keys (A, S, D, H, J, K, L) to distinct drum sounds by implementing JavaScript event listeners for interactive performance.

projects.title: Shoe Store E-commerce Frontend
projects.description: Developed a functional and responsive online store frontend for users to browse and view shoe products.Engineered a clean user interface focusing on product visibility and ease of navigation.
